short_summary: Purchasing of Atlassian software Subscription and maintenance
full_summary:
# Request for Quotation: HT218-246361 Atlassian Software Subscription

**Notice Type:** Request for Quotation (RFQ) issued against a Supply Arrangement (SA)

**Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), Gatineau, QC

**Solicitation Number:** WS4655799163
**Reference Number:** WS4655799163-Doc4655926008
**Incumbent Contracting Entity:** Health Canada

## Invitation to Bid

Pennesium Work Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Health Canada invites Canadian suppliers to submit a quotation for the acquisition of Atlassian subscription licenses and associated maintenance and support services.

**Invited Suppliers:**

- Carahsoft Canada Inc.
- Blended Perspectives
- Valiantys
- Adaptavist Canada LTD
- Highway Three Solutions Ltd.
- Praecipio

## Tender Information

- **Notice Publication Date:** July 8th, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date:** August 2nd, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 21st, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** July 11th, 2025
- **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other trade agreements relevant to Canada.
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
- **Notice Type:** Request for Quotation (RFQ)
## Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications regarding this solicitation, kindly direct them to:

- John Rankin, PSPC
- Email: [john.rankin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:john.rankin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Bid Submissions**

All bid responses to this RFQ must be directed to the above contact email.

**Late Submissions**

 Failure to submit a bid by the stipulated deadline and time of August 2nd, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST will result in your company being removed from the submission list.

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20138581
The link above directs you to the Ariba marketplace where you can access the solicitation package.
